data.title: Frontend Developer
data.summary: Build responsive web apps using React.
data.description: Develop with React, ensure accessibility, collaborate with backend teams.

data.title: Backend Developer
data.description: Design APIs, manage databases, support frontend integration.

data.title: UI/UX Designer
data.description: Create wireframes and collaborate with frontend developers.

data.title: Full Stack Developer
data.summary: Work on both frontend and backend.
data.description: Design end-to-end systems using MERN stack.

data.title: Data Analyst
data.summary: Analyze data trends and build reports.
data.description: Work with SQL, Excel, and visualization tools.

data.title: DevOps Engineer
data.description: CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes expertise needed.

data.title: Mobile App Developer
data.description: Experience with React Native or Flutter.

data.title: Machine Learning Engineer
data.description: Python, ML algorithms, deployment skills required.

data.title: QA Tester
data.description: Manual and automation testing experience preferred.

data.title: Project Manager
data.description: Scrum master certification preferred.

data.title: System Administrator
data.description: Linux, Windows server management.

data.title: Product Designer
data.description: Tools: Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch.

data.title: Data Scientist
data.description: Strong in Python, ML, and business insights.

data.title: React Developer
data.description: Redux, hooks, component architecture experience.

data.title: Tech Lead
data.description: Strong tech skills and team mentoring.

data.title: Network Engineer
data.description: Cisco certified, network security experience preferred.

data.title: AI Researcher
data.description: Research in NLP, CV, and deep learning.

data.title: UI Designer
data.description: Visual design and branding experience a plus.

data.title: Content Strategist

data.title: Software Intern
